{"id":1039030048,"question_id":3046,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1693710523,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1039030048/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make a Special Number","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumOperations(String num) {\n        int len = num.length();\n        \n        // 00, 25 ,50, 75\n        \n        String rev = new StringBuilder(num).reverse().toString();\n        \n        int min =len;\n        // 00, 50\n        int firstZero = rev.indexOf(\"0\");\n        if(firstZero!=-1){\n            // find 5 or 0\n            int five = rev.indexOf(\"5\", firstZero+1);\n            int zero = rev.indexOf(\"0\", firstZero+1);\n            \n            // System.out.println(five + \" \"+ zero +  \" \" +firstZero );\n            \n            if(five!=-1){\n              return five-1;\n            }\n            if(zero!=-1)\n               return zero-1;\n            \n            return len-1;\n        }\n        \n        \n        int firstFive = rev.indexOf(\"5\");\n        if(firstFive!=-1){\n            // find 5 or 0\n            int two = rev.indexOf(\"2\", firstFive+1);\n            int seven = rev.indexOf(\"7\", firstFive+1);\n            \n               // System.out.println(two + \" \"+ seven +  \" \" +firstFive );\n           \n            if(two!=-1)\n               return two-1;\n            if(seven!=-1)\n                return seven-1;\n        }\n        \n        return len;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-a-special-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
